src.datagather.datagather¶

Classes¶

DataGather

Abstract base class for all modules that perform some data gathering.

Module Contents¶

class src.datagather.datagather.DataGather¶

Bases: abc.ABC

Abstract base class for all modules that perform some data gathering.

Methods:

  • gather(): Abstract method to gather data.

  • return_data(): Abstract method to return gathered data.

  • pretty_print(): Abstract method to pretty print the gathered data.

abstract gather()¶

Gather data.

Raises:

  • NotImplementedError: If the method is not implemented in a subclass.

abstract return_data()¶

Return gathered data.

Returns:

  • Any: The gathered data.

Raises:

  • NotImplementedError: If the method is not implemented in a subclass.

abstract pretty_print()¶

Pretty print the gathered data.

Raises:

  • NotImplementedError: If the method is not implemented in a subclass.
